# Pool of Scrying, Greater (WondArch)
## Overview
**Pool of Scrying, Greater:** This magic item works like the standard *[[Pool of Scrying (WondArch)|pool of scrying]]*, with one exception. You can reliably cast any spells through it that you could use with the *[[Scrying, Greater (Spell)|greater scrying]]* spell.

*Caster Level:* 11th; Prerequisites: [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Scrying, Greater (Spell)|greater scrying]]**; Market Price:* 50,000 gp.

**Source:** Stronghold Builders Guidebook (WotC), pg. 82
